import { Container, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup, Button } from "reactstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import '../styles/login.css' import { useState, useContext } from "react" import regImg from '../../assets/images/register.png' import userIcon from '../../assets/images/user.png' import { AuthContext } from "../context/AuthContext" const Register = () => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userName: undefined, email: undefined, password: undefined }) const handleChange = (e) => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })); }; const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() } return (
